Method Detail

unmarshalFromXMLIntoObject

public static java.lang.Object unmarshalFromXMLIntoObject(java.lang.String xmlStr,
                                                          java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                                                   throws UnmarshalException
This method unmarshals the given XML String into an object of the class indicated with the 'clazz' parameter.

Parameters:
xmlStr - The XML String to un-marshal.
clazz - Indicates the class of the object to un-marshal into.
Returns:
If no exception is thrown then the object of type 'clazz' is returned.
Throws:
UnmarshalException - Failed to unmarshal the string. See message of exception for more details.

marshalToXML

public static java.lang.String marshalToXML(javax.xml.bind.JAXBElement<?> object)
                                     throws MarshalException
Returns the string version of the XML presentation of the given JAXBElement.

Parameters:
object - The object to be marshaled to a String.
Returns:
See desc.
Throws:
MarshalException - Failure to marshal the given object to a XML string.
